title: (x) Simple sans in Ledesma logo - Avenir {Akira, Yves}
content:
Looks like Akzidenz or Frutiger, but...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20111214100123im_/http:/typophile.com/files/logo-ledesma_5360.jpg)
author: mchiner

comments.content: This is Adrian Frutiger's classic [Avenir](http://web.archive.org/web/20111214100123/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/linotype/avenir_pro_virtual/), his response to [Futura](http://web.archive.org/web/20111214100123/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontlist/alternatives/futura/).
Argh, wanting to sound clever made me lose this race! :^D
